descripcion:
High potash, high analysis formula with elevated nitrate-nitrogen, supplies three times as much potassium as nitrogen.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Monopotassium Phosphate, Ammonium Sulfate, Iron EDTA, Iron EDDHA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367

POTENTIAL BASICITY: 260 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.
informacionTecnica:
Total Nitrogen (N) 9%
2.8% Ammoniacal Nitrogen
6.2% Nitrate-Nitrogen
Available Phosphate (P2O5)15%
Soluble Potash (K2O) 30%
Sulfur (S) Combined 5.4%

0.05% Chelated Copper (Cu)
Iron (Fe) 0.10%
0.10% Chelated Iron (Fe)
Manganese (Mn) 0.05%
0.05% Chelated Manganese (Mn)
Molybdenum (Mo) 0.001%

0.05% Chelated Zinc (Zn)
